jot.manager.ai

Class AbstractSteeringBehaviorsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.manager.ai.AbstractAI
      • jot.manager.ai.AbstractSteeringBehaviorsManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SteeringBehaviorsManager

    public abstract class AbstractSteeringBehaviorsManager
extends AbstractAI
    Abstract class that each steering behavior class should implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
